person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The Australian opposition on Friday demanded a high-powered investigation into paedophilia in the Australian diplomatic service after the federal court forced the head of the existing inquiry to stand aside .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Australian opposition |
| federal court |
| head of the existing inquiry |

Note: I'm assuming that "head of the existing inquiry" refers to a specific person, although the phrasing is a bit ambiguous. If more context is available, it might be possible to identify this person by name.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| head of the existing inquiry |

Note: In the original paragraph, "Australian opposition" and "federal court" are not clearly "Person" entities. "Australian opposition" generally refers to a political group rather than an individual person, and "federal court" is an institution rather than a person. Therefore, I have removed them from the list of valid entities. However, "head of the existing inquiry" is likely to refer to a specific person, so I have kept it in the list.

The only clear "Location" entity in the paragraph is the "Australian diplomatic service," which refers to a specific location within the country where the alleged wrongdoing took place.
